verses.verse: Now shalt thou <S%H1413>gather<s%> thyself in <S%H1416>troops<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1416>troops<s%>: he hath <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H4692>siege<s%> against <S%H5221>us<s%>; they shall smite the <S%H8199>judge<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with a <S%H7626>rod<s%> upon the <S%H3895>cheek<s%>.

But <S%H1035>thou<s%>, Beth-lehem <S%H672>Ephrathah<s%>, which art <S%H6810>little<s%> to be among the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, out of thee shall one come <S%H3318>forth<s%> unto me that is to be <S%H4910>ruler<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; whose goings <S%H4163>forth<s%> are from of <S%H6924>old<s%>, from <S%H3117>everlasting<s%>.

Therefore will he give them <S%H5414>up<s%>, until the <S%H6256>time<s%> that she who <S%H3205>travaileth<s%> hath brought <S%H3205>forth<s%>: then the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of his <S%H251>brethren<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5975>stand<s%>, and shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> his flock in the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, in the <S%H1347>majesty<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%>: and they shall <S%H3427>abide<s%>; for now shall he be <S%H1431>great<s%> unto the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And this man shall be our <S%H7965>peace<s%>. When the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> into our <S%H776>land<s%>, and when he shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> in our <S%H759>palaces<s%>, then shall we <S%H6965>raise<s%> against him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>, and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H5257>principal<s%> <S%H120>men<s%>.

And they shall <S%H7462>waste<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5248>Nimrod<s%> in the <S%H6607>entrances<s%> <S%H5337>thereof<s%>: and he shall deliver us from the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%>, when he <S%H935>cometh<s%> into our <S%H776>land<s%>, and when he <S%H1869>treadeth<s%> within our <S%H1366>border<s%>.

And the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall be in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> as <S%H2919>dew<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, as <S%H7241>showers<s%> upon the <S%H6212>grass<s%>, that <S%H6960>tarry<s%> not for <S%H376>man<s%>, nor <S%H3176>wait<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.

And the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall be among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, as a <S%H738>lion<s%> among the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>, as a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> among the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep<s%>; <S%H5674>who<s%>, if he go through, treadeth <S%H7429>down<s%> and teareth in <S%H2963>pieces<s%>, and there is none to <S%H5337>deliver<s%>.
Let thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> be lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> above thine <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>, and let all thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> thy <S%H5483>horses<s%> out of the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H6>thee<s%>, and will destroy thy <S%H4818>chariots<s%>:
and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H6145>cities<s%> of thy <S%H776>land<s%>, and will throw <S%H2040>down<s%> all thy <S%H4013>strongholds<s%>.
And I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H3785>witchcrafts<s%> out of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and thou shalt have no more <S%H6049>soothsayers<s%>:

and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> thy graven <S%H6456>images<s%> and thy <S%H4676>pillars<s%> out of the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7812>thee<s%>; and thou shalt no more worship the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hands<s%>;
and I will pluck <S%H5428>up<s%> thine <S%H842>Asherim<s%> out of the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H8045>thee<s%>; and I will destroy thy <S%H6145>cities<s%>.
And I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which hearkened <S%H8085>not<s%>.
